Entelo is a new and better way to recruit. The Entelo platform leverages big data, predictive analytics and social signals to help recruiting organizations find, qualify and engage with inÂ­demand talent.

Entelo gives companies like Facebook, Box, AT&T, ESPN and Salesforce a competitive advantage in building great teams.

Our team is small but growing so you'll play an integral role in building something meaningful. We work hard while respecting that our colleagues have well-rounded lives, and we strive for a diverse, welcoming, and respectful environment.
